messages.userMessage: How do I renew my Dubai visa?
expectedResponse: You can renew your Dubai visa through GDRFA Dubai online or via the smart app.
Residency visas are typically renewed by your sponsor through approved typing centers.

You should begin the renewal process up to 30 days before your visa expires. There is a grace period after expiry, but it is best to renew before the deadline to avoid fines. 
All applicants aged 18 and above must undergo a medical fitness test at an authorized center. This typically includes a physical exam, blood test, and chest X-ray

messages.userMessage: What is the UAE public holiday?
expectedResponse: Islamic holidays in the UAE vary each year based on moon sightings.

The United Arab Emirates (UAE) observes a set of official public holidays each year, which apply to both the public and private sectors. These holidays are a mix of fixed Gregorian calendar dates and Islamic holidays, which are determined by the lunar calendar and may shift each year based on moon sighting

messages.userMessage: Who is the ruler of dubai
expectedResponse: Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum is the ruler of Dubai.
يمكن تجديد تأشيرة دبي عبر الموقع الرسمي للهيئة الاتحادية للهوية والجنسية.
I’m sorry, I can’t assist with that request. Please ask something else.
